Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.FactoryMatch

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.FactoryMatch.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Game class represents the state of the match, it contains the implements the objects of the game Eriantys

    Method
    Description
    void
    buildTower(Wizard wizard, Archipelago archipelago)
    This method builds the tower of the wizard on the archipelago, each of them passed as parameter, an exception is thrown if there is an error in the built of the towers

    getArchipelagos()
    This method returns the archipelagos of the game

    This method returns the mother nature of the game

    getStudentBag()
    This method returns the student bag of the game
    Wizard
    getWizardFromPlayer(Player player)
    This method returns the wizard who is associated to the player passed to Game, if there is no wizard associated to the player the method throws an exception
    int
    getWizardInfluenceInArchipelago(Wizard wizard, Archipelago archipelago)
    This method returns the influence of the player in the archipelago passed as parameters of the method if the player does not have a corresponding wizard in the game, the method throws an exception
    List<Wizard>
    getWizards()
    This method returns the wizards of the game
    List<Wizard>
    getWizardsWithLeastTowers()
    This method's return the wizard with the least towers
    void
    moveStudentFromCloudToBoard(Player player, Cloud cloud)
    This method move the students from the cloud passed to the game to the board of the wizard associated to the player, if the move is not allowed the method throws an exception
    void
    placeMotherNature(Player player, Archipelago archipelago)
    This method manage the movement on the archipelagos of mother nature , it throws an exception if asked to move mother nature into the same position she already was or if the archipelago passed is not in the game.
    void
    placeProfessor(Color c)
    This method place the professor of color passed as parameter to the wizard with the largest number of students with that color, the method throws an exception if it is not possible to determinate the wizard with most students of the color passed or if there was an error in determinate which wizard was the older owner of the professor of the color passed
    void
    placeStudentOnArchipelago(Player player, Student student, Archipelago archipelago)
    This method place the student selected by the player to the passed archipelago, if the student is not movable or the player is not in the game, the method throws an exception
    void
    placeStudentOnTable(Player player, Student student)
    This method place the student selected by the player to the board of the corresponding wizard, if the student is not movable or the player is not in the game, the method throws an exception
    Wizard
    selectWizardWithMostStudents(Color c)
    This method returns the wizard who has most students of the color passed as parameter, if there are more than one wizard with the same largest number of students, the method throws an exception
    void
    setArchipelagos()
    This method initialize the archipelagos of the game, it puts 2 students on each archipelago except for the one which contains mother nature or is the opposite of the archipelago who contains mother nature, the method throws an exception if there is an error with the set of mother nature
    void
    setClouds(int numberOfClouds, int numberOfStudentsOnCloud)
    This method sets the number of clouds presents in the game and how many students are on top of each
    void
    setProfessors()
    This method sets the professors of the game, one for each value of Color
    void
    setRandomlyFirstPlayer()
    This method set randomly the first player of the match
    void
    setRandomlyStudentsInEntrance()
    This method sets randomly on each entrance of the wizard's board, the maximum allowed number of students, each of one is drawn from the studentBag
    void
    setRandomStudentsOnCloud()
    This method sets student drawn from studentBag on each cloud, the method throws an exception if it is not possible to place students on the clouds
    void
    setTowers(int numOfTowers)
    This method sets the Towers of each wizard on his corresponding board
    void
    setWizards(List<Player> player)
    This method sets the relation between the players and the wizards of the game and sets a different color of tower for every wizard
    void
    takeCareOfTheMerge(Archipelago archipelago)
    This method controls the correct merge of the archipelagos, starting from the one passed as parameter if it is not possible to merge two archipelagos the method throws an exception

    • Game

      public Game(int limitOfStudentInEntrance, int numOfStudentMovable)
      Constructor of Game class
      Parameters:
      limitOfStudentInEntrance - is the number of Students allowed in the entrance of the board of each wizard
      numOfStudentMovable - is the number of students movable by the player in one round

    • setWizards

      public void setWizards(List<Player> player)
      This method sets the relation between the players and the wizards of the game and sets a different color of tower for every wizard
      Parameters:
      player - is the collection of player

    • setTowers

      public void setTowers(int numOfTowers)
      This method sets the Towers of each wizard on his corresponding board
      Parameters:
      numOfTowers - is the number of towers which have to be settled on the board

    • setClouds

      public void setClouds(int numberOfClouds, int numberOfStudentsOnCloud) throws ExceptionGame
      This method sets the number of clouds presents in the game and how many students are on top of each
      Parameters:
      numberOfClouds - is the number of clouds in the game
      numberOfStudentsOnCloud - is the number of students on each cloud
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame

    • setProfessors

      public void setProfessors()
      This method sets the professors of the game, one for each value of Color

    • setArchipelagos

      public void setArchipelagos() throws ExceptionGame
      This method initialize the archipelagos of the game, it puts 2 students on each archipelago except for the one which contains mother nature or is the opposite of the archipelago who contains mother nature, the method throws an exception if there is an error with the set of mother nature
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if there is an error with the set of mother nature

    • getWizardFromPlayer

      public Wizard getWizardFromPlayer(Player player) throws ExceptionGame
      This method returns the wizard who is associated to the player passed to Game, if there is no wizard associated to the player the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      player - is the player
      Returns:
      the wizard associated to the player
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown where there is no association between the player and the wizards in the game

    • getWizardInfluenceInArchipelago

      public int getWizardInfluenceInArchipelago(Wizard wizard, Archipelago archipelago)
      This method returns the influence of the player in the archipelago passed as parameters of the method if the player does not have a corresponding wizard in the game, the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      wizard - is the wizard
      archipelago - is the archipelago
      Returns:
      the influence of the player in the archipelago

    • selectWizardWithMostStudents

      public Wizard selectWizardWithMostStudents(Color c) throws ExceptionGame
      This method returns the wizard who has most students of the color passed as parameter, if there are more than one wizard with the same largest number of students, the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      c - is the color
      Returns:
      the wizard with the most students of color c
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown when there are more than one wizard with the same largest number of students of color c

    • setRandomStudentsOnCloud

      public void setRandomStudentsOnCloud() throws ExceptionGame
      This method sets student drawn from studentBag on each cloud, the method throws an exception if it is not possible to place students on the clouds
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - if it is not possible to sets students

    • placeProfessor

      public void placeProfessor(Color c) throws ExceptionGame
      This method place the professor of color passed as parameter to the wizard with the largest number of students with that color, the method throws an exception if it is not possible to determinate the wizard with most students of the color passed or if there was an error in determinate which wizard was the older owner of the professor of the color passed
      Parameters:
      c - is the color
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if it is not possible to determinate the wizard with most students of the color passed or if there was an error in determinate which wizard was the older owner of the professor of the color passed

    • placeStudentOnArchipelago

      public void placeStudentOnArchipelago(Player player, Student student, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame
      This method place the student selected by the player to the passed archipelago, if the student is not movable or the player is not in the game, the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      player - is the player
      student - is the student
      archipelago - is the archipelago
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown when the player is not associated a no wizard in the game or the student not movable

    • placeStudentOnTable

      public void placeStudentOnTable(Player player, Student student) throws ExceptionGame
      This method place the student selected by the player to the board of the corresponding wizard, if the student is not movable or the player is not in the game, the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      player - is the player
      student - is the student
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown when the player is not associated a no wizard in the game or the student not movable

    • placeMotherNature

      public void placeMotherNature(Player player, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame
      This method manage the movement on the archipelagos of mother nature , it throws an exception if asked to move mother nature into the same position she already was or if the archipelago passed is not in the game.
      Parameters:
      archipelago - archipelago where the player wants to place mother nature
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown when the archipelago is not present in the game or mother nature is asked to be placed in the same position where she was already

    • moveStudentFromCloudToBoard

      public void moveStudentFromCloudToBoard(Player player, Cloud cloud) throws ExceptionGame
      This method move the students from the cloud passed to the game to the board of the wizard associated to the player, if the move is not allowed the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      player - is the player
      cloud - is the cloud where are the students the player wants to move
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if the move is not allowed

    • buildTower

      public void buildTower(Wizard wizard, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame
      This method builds the tower of the wizard on the archipelago, each of them passed as parameter, an exception is thrown if there is an error in the built of the towers
      Parameters:
      archipelago - is the archipelago
      wizard - is the wizard
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if there was an error in the built of the towers

    • takeCareOfTheMerge

      public void takeCareOfTheMerge(Archipelago archipelago)
      This method controls the correct merge of the archipelagos, starting from the one passed as parameter if it is not possible to merge two archipelagos the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      archipelago - is the starting archipelagos
